Package edu.ou.cs2334.project4.models

Class NonogramMakerModel

java.lang.Object
edu.ou.cs2334.project4.models.NonogramMakerModel
public class NonogramMakerModel extends Object
This is the NonogramMakerModel class. It is designed to create a model NonogramMaker with a file, string or just by entering the number of rows and columns.
Version:
0.1
Author:
Collaboration of Natalie Hill and Keon Moradi

      public NonogramMakerModel(int numRows, int numCols)
      Constructor for the NonogramMakerModel
      Parameters:
      numRows - number of rows the model should have
      numCols - number of columns the model should have
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - throws exception if either numRows or numCols is equal to or less than 0

      Parameters:
      cells - an array of boolean values
      Returns:
